title: Column icons don't appear when connecting to a Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible in the Available Items section.
OB: In the Available Items section, the column icons are not visible when connecting to a Derby database.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, I expect to see the table icons and column icons in the Available Items section. However, only the table icons are visible. The column icons are missing.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application and navigate to the Data Source tab. 2. Connect to a Derby database. 3. Expand the Data Source to see the Available Items section. 4. Observe that only the table icons are visible, while the column icons are missing.
